title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.3 - Times when records are available
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.3 - Times when records are available

State Regulations

Requests to inspect or secure copies of department records
may be made at the offices set forth in section
187.2
of this Part on any State
business day between the hours of 8:30 a.m. and 5 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
187.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
